title: What else could happen to top off 2020 as the worst year in living memory? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bad as it is, things could be a LOT worse. We could have: major tsunami (like the 2004 Indian Ocean wave that killed 250,000 people)major earthquake (like the 2011 Haiti earthquake that killed over 220,000 people)the launch of yet another Law & Order series, focusing on crimes against petsnuclear war (killing millions)conquest of all of Latin America by Marxist/socialist groupsan unstoppable incontinence plaguealien invasion followed by the enslavement of humanityterrorist groups deploy radiological and chemical weaponsgiant sea-fart releases billions of tons of methane into the atmosphereTrump wins re-electioneverybody’s passwords on every account are changed to 1234 or password and cannot be editedstudios announce six new Twilight movies

You do not want to know too much completely, yet; The solar output before our star the Sun is already removed the last two ice fields from Canada. More heat is now coming and now Greenland ice fields are really under stress. The temperature of the Arctic Ocean is really going to become a problem. This is summer and the North will begin (a type of burning). We only have a short time until the Sun itself crosses over and heads for Australia. Remain out of direct sunlight as much as possible. Cancer particularly melanoma (which i s skin cancer) is the worst cancer of them all and with the higher output from the star our Sun then many more will find this cancer on their own bodies. You have enough now to remind you that covid19 is not the end of life. NOT YET ANYWAY.
